info.sourceTextContent: Reseguin, con un puñado de bravos, restablece el órden, escarmienta á los indios, y los pone en la imposibilidad de volverse á lanzar contra la autoridad pública. Su marcha hasta el Cuzco fué una série continuada de combates y triunfos.
info.suspiciousTextContent: Reseguin, with a handful of brave, restore order, a warning to the Indians, and makes it impossible to re-launch against the public authority. His up to Cuzco was a continued series of battles and triumphs
